name: mysql
readme:
* This plugin wraps mysqld and mysql_install_db to work in your local project
* This plugin will create a new database for your project in MYSQL_DATADIR if one doesn't exist on shell init. This DB will be started in `insecure` mode, so be sure to add a root password after creation if needed.
* Use mysqld to manually start the server, and `mysqladmin -u root shutdown` to manually stop it
